laws.name: Person
laws.description: Any individual or living human being.

laws.name: Peace Officer
laws.description: An on-duty individual identified as an officer of the law through badge or protocol.

laws.name: Weapon
laws.description: Any item or tool used to inflict or threaten physical harm.

laws.name: MDC
laws.description: Mobile Database of Criminals; the official state system for ID and records.

laws.name: Stacking Charges
laws.description: Suspect committing the same offense multiple times; counts are added to the record.

laws.name: Self Defense / Castle Doctrine
laws.description: Use of necessary force to prevent imminent death or serious injury to self or others.

laws.name: Suspicion & Detainment
laws.description: Justifiable suspicion allows for temporary detainment and Terry Frisks for safety.

laws.name: Officer Discretion
laws.description: Authority to forego penalties for infractions or select misdemeanors based on judgment.

laws.name: Verbal Intimidation
laws.description: Willfully threatening a crime that results in fear for safety or serious injury.

laws.name: Attempted Assault
laws.description: Unlawful attempt to commit violent injury without physical contact.

laws.name: Assault with Lethal Weapon
laws.description: Attempted assault or battery utilizing a deadly instrument or firearm.

laws.name: Unlawful Battery
laws.description: Willful and illegal use of physical force against another individual.

laws.name: Aggravated Battery
laws.description: Physical battery resulting in serious or permanent bodily injury.

laws.name: Attempted Homicide
laws.description: Taking a direct step with the specific intent to end a human life.

laws.name: Premeditated Murder
laws.description: Unlawful killing of a human with malice aforethought and planning.

laws.name: Capital Homicide
laws.description: Murder of a public official, officer, or during a kidnapping/hostage event.

laws.name: Malicious Arson
laws.description: Intentionally setting fire to structures, land, or personal property.

laws.name: Trespassing
laws.description: Entering private or closed property without valid authorization.

laws.name: Burglary
laws.description: Illegal entry into a secured premises with the intent to commit theft or a felony.

laws.name: Grand Theft Auto
laws.description: Theft or unauthorized taking of any motor vehicle.

laws.name: Armed Robbery
laws.description: Theft of property using force or fear facilitated by a weapon.

laws.name: Illegal Weapon Possession
laws.description: Possessing unregistered firearms, explosive rounds, or carrying while a felon.

laws.name: Negligent Discharge
laws.description: Willfully firing a weapon in a manner that creates risk of death or injury.

laws.name: Drive-By Shooting
laws.description: Discharging a weapon from a vehicle or facilitating such an act.

laws.name: Transit Interference
laws.description: Obstructing or endangering the operation of public transit systems.

laws.name: Excessive Speed
laws.description: Operating a vehicle above the legally posted speed limit.

laws.name: Failure to Yield
laws.description: Neglecting to yield right-of-way to emergency vehicles or pedestrians.

laws.name: Unlicensed Harvesting
laws.description: Hunting or fishing without the required state permits.

laws.name: Poaching
laws.description: Taking wildlife out of season or exceeding legal bag limits.

laws.name: Human Trafficking
laws.description: Recruitment or transport of persons via force or deception for labor/sex.

laws.name: Counterfeiting
laws.description: Forgery or creation of fake government securities or currency.

laws.name: Terrorism
laws.description: Acts dangerous to human life intended to intimidate or coerce a population.
